\tgt[8]Phew, thanks you two. I thought I was a goner.

but our mother is no longer of this world.

\tgt[8]No, I'm fairly sure she's still alive.

so you must have inherited some of her powers.\!

\tgt[8]Perfect, then it seems like we're in an agreement.
\tgt[8]But I'm not dead weight. I'll support you in battle.
But first, I need to rest.
I left some of my gear to the left. Let's go get it.
Ah, thank you. It's my armour.
